hero.headline: Group Health Sharing for Employers & Contractors
hero.subheadline: Affordable healthcare solutions for your team
hero.description: Provide comprehensive healthcare benefits to your employees or contractors without the high costs and complexity of traditional group insurance. ACA-compatible options available.

employerFocus.title: Smart Healthcare Benefits for Employers
employerFocus.description: Attract and retain top talent with affordable health sharing benefits that cost significantly less than traditional group insurance while providing comprehensive coverage.

benefits.title: Reduce Benefits Costs
benefits.description: Save 40-60% on healthcare benefits compared to traditional group insurance premiums while maintaining quality coverage for your team.

benefits.title: Flexible Enrollment
benefits.description: No minimum participation requirements or complex enrollment processes. Employees can join throughout the year with simplified applications.

benefits.title: List-Bill Convenience
benefits.description: Streamlined billing process with single monthly invoices. We handle all the administrative work so you can focus on your business.

benefits.title: ACA Compliance Options
benefits.description: Pair with Minimum Essential Coverage (MEC) plans where applicable to meet ACA employer mandate requirements.

benefits.title: Quick Implementation
benefits.description: Get your group program up and running in just a few weeks with our streamlined implementation process.

benefits.title: Dedicated Support
benefits.description: Assigned account manager and dedicated customer service for your employees with priority support channels.

contractorFocus.title: Healthcare Solutions for 1099 Contractors
contractorFocus.description: Help your independent contractors access affordable healthcare without the complexity of traditional benefits administration.

benefits.title: Contractor-Friendly Benefits
benefits.description: Provide access to healthcare benefits for 1099 contractors without employment classification concerns or complex administration.

benefits.title: Cost-Effective Solution
benefits.description: Significantly lower costs than COBRA or individual insurance, making it an attractive benefit for contractors.

benefits.title: Nationwide Coverage
benefits.description: Contractors can access care anywhere in the US without network restrictions, perfect for remote or traveling workers.

benefits.title: Self-Service Platform
benefits.description: Contractors manage their own enrollment, payments, and claims through our intuitive online platform and mobile app.

benefits.title: Flexible Terms
benefits.description: Month-to-month participation with no long-term commitments, allowing contractors to join or leave as needed.

benefits.title: Competitive Advantage
benefits.description: Attract better contractors by offering this valuable benefit that sets you apart from competitors.

acaCompliance.title: ACA Compliance Made Simple
acaCompliance.description: For applicable large employers (50+ full-time employees), we offer solutions to help meet ACA requirements while keeping costs manageable.
pairings: Health sharing plans paired with Minimum Essential Coverage (MEC)
Seamless integration with existing benefits platforms

advisorCTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Employee Benefits?
advisorCTA.description: Our benefits advisors specialize in helping employers design cost-effective healthcare solutions. Get a custom proposal tailored to your organization's needs.
